SENT.plain: Diamond-Blackfan anemia (DBA) is associated with congenital anomalies especially of the midline
When present, facial anomalies are reminiscent of Treacher-Collins syndrome, and both DBA and Treacher-Collins syndrome are disorders of ribosomal biogenesis
Herein, we describe a female infant with multiple midline defects associated with DBA and reaffirm the absence of RPS-19 mutations in DBA patients with facial anomalies
